snippet: Priests from the Archdiocese of Philadelphia met Wednesday with Archbishop Charles J. Chaput ahead of an announcement about results of an investigation into claims of sexual abuse against 27 priests.
abstract: Several hundred Roman Catholic priests from the Archdiocese of Philadelphia gather for a closed-door meeting with Archbishop Charles J Chaput, who has said he will soon announce the results of an investigation into claims of sexual abuse against 27 priests.
lead_paragraph: Priests from the Archdiocese of Philadelphia met Wednesday with Archbishop Charles J. Chaput ahead of an announcement about results of an investigation into claims of sexual abuse against 27 priests.

headline.seo: Sign of Possible Decision on Accused Philadelphia Priests
headline.main: Signs of Decision on Accused Philadelphia Priests
headline.print_headline: Signs of Decision on Accused Philadelphia Priests
